description:
Amami heads to a theme park with all her friends, living and otherwise (and Yamada`s older brother, for some reason)! According to her father, this particular theme park is the site of some fond memories for Amami, but now that she`s older the memories have begun
to fade...until a mysterious girl appears before her. Join the whole Re-Kan! gang as they make the most of a beautiful summer day, capped off with a sleepover at the Amami residence!
Source: crunchyroll
